name: Irenna
motivation: Protect the innocent and expose corruption.
goal:
Unmask the high judge’s crimes.
Needed Object: Puppet String Spool
Treasure: Judge's Diary Page
Dialogue Hooks:
dialogue_hooks:
"The little ones know more than you think — they just talk with string and wood."
"Every play I perform is a truth they can't imprison."
veil_connection: Her puppet shows move on their own; orphan children may be Veil-touched.
